name: Cabin Cat and the Big Storm
name_original: Cabin Cat and the Big Storm
description:
Try to survive as a tiny cat preparing for a BIG storm!

Made in 5 days for the 2022 Sleeping Giant Game Jam! The theme was, Advancing Wall of Doom!

Controls:

WASD to Move

Q, E, or SpaceBar to Interact

How to play: 

Collect resources to repair your house, so you can take shelter for the night. Survive for 4 nights so you can get rescued!
